mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hewes, David T. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hewes, David T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 19 1861. By Telegraph, from Clarksburg 19 1861. Cavalry companies are coming here there will be five companies in a few days I would suggest you appoint some competent officer as Col & let him take charge of them as they arrive the sooner this is done the better. DT Hewes 41D133pd [page 2] Col Hewes Clarksburg July 19
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hewes, David T.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
